relation: Query the preferred DNS server on a preferred connection.
Query the preferred DNS server on all connections.
Query all DNS servers on all connections (1st attempt).
Query all DNS servers on all connections (2nd attempt).
Query all DNS servers on all connections (3rd attempt).
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {23627=Windows 2000 does not add this entry to the registry. You can add it by editing the registry or by using a program that edits the registry.}

textAfterTable: 4th limit 4 seconds Query all DNS servers on all connections (2nd attempt). 5th limit 8 seconds Query all DNS servers on all connections (3rd attempt). 6th value (Must be 0.)   Note The integers in this entry each appear on a separate line in the registry editors.
